name: NPR
text:
Six states have joined forces to buy 3 million coronavirus tests to address "severe testing shortages and delays" that have hamstrung the nation's response to the pandemic.
https://t.co/RT2jgH2yWT

name: NPR
text:
Here are some of an expert's tips for navigating public disagreements about pandemic safety:
✅ Show mutual consideration
✅ Take steps to protect yourself
✅ Let go of actions that don't affect you
Get the rest, and a printable pocket guide, here: https://t.co/Khp6PN9Tzc
